entry.title: Creating an application for a website on OSX
entry.summary: I wanted to get a desktop application for a website that doesn't provide one, and had success with https://github.com/eladnava/applicationize. This worked a treat for my local Home Assistant instance, so now I don't need to open a tab in my web-browser.

entry.title: Using nmap to find all devices on network listening on a particular port
entry.summary:
Finding all IPs listening on a particular port using nmap:

nmap -p 80 --open -sV 192.168.1.0/24

Refs: * http://thoughtsbyclayg.blogspot.co.uk/2008/06/use-nmap-to-scan-for-ssh-servers-on.html * https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-use-nmap-to-scan-for-open-ports-on-your-vps

entry.title: Vim search and replace across many files
entry.summary:
A powerful combination of commands for search and replace across multiple files with Vim.

http://vim.wikia.com/wiki/Opening_multiple_files_from_a_single_command-line http://vim.wikia.com/wiki/Search_and_replace_in_multiple_buffers

:arg **/*.cpp

:argdo %s/pattern/replace/ge | update
